item.title: PUPIHOM Cat Water Fountain, 3.4L/115oz Pet Water Dispenser for Cat, Dog Small to Medium Pets Inside, Extremely Quiet, Spill Proof Cat Fountain Water Bowl with 3 Washable Replacement Filters
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs. CW002 Pet Water Fountain ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:05 UTC – Details)

From the brand

At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs.

CW002 Pet Water Fountain

CW003 Pet Water Fountain

CW004 Pet Water Fountain

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.67 x 8.58 x 5.59 inches; 2.71 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Submarine
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ H&H
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09ZPBW85D
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Switzerland

【Wide Drinking Area】The drinking dispenser with the 300ml extra-large water dish is ideal for families with multiple pets. Even in the event of a sudden power outage, there is enough water to last a day.
【Noise-Free】The pet water fountain is equipped with unique water way design which reduces the sound of the water flow to less than 36 decibels, and enjoys a quiet moment with your cute pet.
【Premium Materials】The dispenser is made from high quality ABS material which is BPA free, for a more durable experience.
【Powerful Filtration】The 3-stage filtration system of the water fountain effectively removes sediment, dust, hair, odor, chlorine, heavy metals for a clean drinking experience.
【3 Flow Modes】The fountain has 3 modes namely spring, flower bubble and flower waterfall, which can be switched as per the pet’s needs, which will help keep your pet interested to help them drink more water.
【After Sales】With our reliable quality control, customer service and technical support, we provide you with a 6 month return policy. If you have any confusion regard to the product, please feel free to contact us.
Note: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

PUPIHOM CW003 Pet Water Fountain

* 7*24 circulating filtration, so that every drop of water can be fully purified, drinking clean, soft water for a long time is beneficial to the health of the pet’s urinary system.

* The pet water feeder solves your trouble of frequently feeding pets. The 3.4L effective capacity can supply a small and medium pet for a week, which is suitable for families who often take short trips.

* Design Patent: The water flowing from the drinking tray can wash away the hair and debris on the surface, keeping the water clean at all times.

* The appearance of this automatic water dispenser is designed by an Italian designer, which conforms to modern aesthetics, making it not only a pet water dispenser, but also matches the design of your home.

  • Model: CW003
  • Capacity: 3.4L/115oz
  • Filters: 3 Pack
  • Filter Model: PAWF001
  • ! For indoor use only!
  • ! The filter should be changed every 2 to 3 Weeks
  • ! The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks

Read more

Anti-dry-burning pump, you don’t have to worry about burning out the pump even if there is water shortage. The pump has a life span of 2.5 to 4 years.

The three-speed adjustable water pump can be used with different water outlet modes. It is recommended to use the lowest gear with the spring mode, and the mid-range and high-end gears with the faucet mode.

Removable water pump, easy to clean, proper cleaning and maintenance of the pump will help prolong the service life of the pump, it is recommended to clean it once a month.

Read more

Safety Protection: 1.2m woven power cord, which is sturdy and tight, and not easy to be bitten or chewed by pets, don’t worry about pet safety.

Minimalist structure, easy to install and clean, it is recommended to clean the pet drinking fountain once a month.

Contains 3 replacement filters. The triple filtration system with water softening function ensures safer, cleaner, and fresher drinking water, making your pet healthier.

Read more


Cat Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Model CW002 CW003 CW004
Capacity 1.8L/61oz 3.4L/115oz 2.4L/81oz
Flow Mode 2 3 3
Filter Model PAWF002 PAWF001 PAWF001
Replacement Filters B0B2P3Z5K2 B0B2JYRZCD B0B2JYRZCD

Q: Where can I get replacement filters?

A: Please search for B0B2JYRZCD for the replacement filters.

Q: The pet water fountain does not run with water, what should I do?

A: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

Q: Can l use this drinking fountain outside?

A: No. This fountain is designed for indoor use only.

Q: How frequently do l need to replace the filter?

A: According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, please replace the filter every 2 to 3 weeks.

Q: How often should l clean the fountain?

A: The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks. Please clean it once a week if you re living in an area with hard water.

Q: Does it have to be plugged in all the time or can it run on batteries?

A: This pet fountain has no batteries, so it needs to be always plugged in.

3.5
Price: $42.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:05 UTC – Details)

function getLoadingGifDiv() {
return ‘‘;
}

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $46.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:52 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

Super Bright Lighting

Solar motion sensor lights equipped with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K brightness, suitable as security lighting for your home.

5 Rotatable Lighting Heads

Solar wall lights has 5 swiveling lighting heads,the adjustable lamp cap can freely move up and down, left and right,which can meet various angles of irradiation.

Easy Setup

The solar led outdoor lights are easy installation, no annoying wires connect or adapters,only using the included screws to fix on any exterior & interior wall or all types of material including metal, wood or plastic.

2023 Newest Solar Lights For Outside Inside House – Super Bright LED Motion Detection Floodlights with 5 Lighting Heads

Warm Tips

1. When the solar panel is unplugged from the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2, mode 3 and mode 4 can work both at day and night.

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

1. Please turn the solar motion sensing lights power switch to the “ON” position before first time using. then press the gear switch or use remote control to adjust the lighting mode.

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Upgraded 4 Lighting Modes: solar motion activated light has 4 lighting modes: Mode 1: the light turn on for 20s when detected movement at night. Mode 2: light turns on in dim mode at night, get brighter for 20s when detected movement. Mode 3: the light will always turn on and stay medium light at night with or without detecting motion. Mode 4: light turns on for 20 seconds when detects movements both in daytime and night.
Innovative 5 Lighting Heads Design: our solar wall lamps is equipped with 5 rotating lighting heads and pivoting solar panels,it can move up and down, left and right, easily adjust the lamp cap,solar panel and motion sensor to any angles as your requirement,up to 360° wide lighting angle,bring you a fantastic lighting experience.
Ultra Bright with 300LED Solar Power Lights: with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K high brightness output,which can fully achieve the brightness required by daily life. equipped with upgraded PIR motion sensor, solar spot lights can detect up to 120 degree with a longer sensor length of 28feet,motion detection solar lights can sense people,animal,cars etc.
All Weather Resistant: solar garden lights is made of durable high-strength ABS material,reaching IP65 waterproof level,which can withstand many kinds of extreme weather, such as snow, frost,rain and high temperature etc,great led exterior flood lights for fence, balcony, pathway, patio,porch,deck,street,stairs,steps,yard etc
